goal: Come up with trivia by choosing supporting information from the data store for the basis of the trivia, then use that information with some extra choices to assemble the trivia, along with hints towards the solution. List sources which contain the answer, point out the section within the source.

steps.text: Step 1. Come up with a trivia
Step 1.1. Silently randomly choose unique interesting information from Tool ${TOOL: Sustainability} as a basis of the trivia
Step 1.2. Silently use the selected information to construct the trivia question and several choices, only one of which is correct.
Step 1.3. Think of a hint towards solving the trivia.
Step 1.4. Think of a more specific hint towards solving the trivia.
Step 1.5. Think of the source within Tool ${TOOL: Sustainability} which contains information for the answer.
Step 1.6. Think of a section within the source of the previous step in ${TOOL: Sustainability}.
Step 1.7. Present all of the above step's information in a structured JSON format defined by the examples.
Step 1.8. Do not add any follow up questions or any other response besides the structured JSON.
Do not add any follow up questions, just supply the information requested.
